Directed by: George Blair Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 23 February 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A jeweled Madonna, property of rancher Joe Salinas, attracts two crooks to his ranch, Monica Dell, a smooth operator, and ruthless Nick Julian. Joe believe that the statue has a miraculous power to ward off evil, and Monica, after a narrow escape from injury while trying to steal the statue, is converted to Joe's faith and refuses to go through with the robbery. Nick has no such intentions.
